title: Very Abusive Player
body:
Hey guys, just thought I'd post this

I'm in a game right now with a Soraka that has told me to kill myself multiple times. I've asked the enemy team to report her for verbal abuse, but they all refused since it was not in all chat. Honestly, I'd like this to be upvoted so a Rioter could see this and take action against this player. I've asked my team to report her also, but she is playing with a few of them, so they won't report her. The reason this is on the boards is because I know that a player usually need 3-5 reports to get punished, and I don't believe this will be achieved. For any of those interested, I am playing Kindred, below are the timestamps for the 'kys', please note that saying kys was not the only verbal abuse delivered by her.

12:17 14:06 16:15

replies.body: It only takes one report to trigger the system to review a player's game.  Just make a note in the box post-game about exactly what happened.  The system will take care of it.

> [{quoted}](name=TheCurator,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:30:36.756+0000)
>
> It only takes one report to trigger the system to review a player's game.  Just make a note in the box post-game about exactly what happened.  The system will take care of it.

The system is automated, 1 report will not do anything.
He is right. It only takes 1 report to trigger a review. Reporting the player is the best course of action.
This information is incorrect and will be proven to be misleading customers when Riot gets/is getting sued.
I'll bite. Sued for what and by whom?
You're not actually ever going to get that info. I've been trying to get those details for over a day now.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:37:05.202+0000)
>
> He is right. It only takes 1 report to trigger a review. Reporting the player is the best course of action.

Thanks, I can only hope he gets punished
While I hate this guys overall post, what he says is true. Additionally riot's tribunal algorithm includes play time/day and RP purchases when  evaluating punishment decisions.

> Additionally riot's tribunal algorithm includes play time/day and RP purchases when evaluating punishment decisions.

What? I don't think I blacked out while writing the code and added additional random logic. Nope, just checked .. didn't black out. :-).

One report is all it takes to trigger a game review. There is no consideration for play time or purchases. Spending money in no way affects your ability to be punished.
LOOOOOL. Telling a Riot member he's wrong.

He isn't "wrong,"  he is lying, and if you spend the time googling the CA high courts notes on the current litigation going on with Riot, you will find out Riot does in fact lie to their members about their tribunal system.
I did Google that.  Guess what? No such results.  Maybe instead making unfounded claims, provide some actual sources to back you up, instead of "Google it."

> [{quoted}](name=BakaNerd,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000001,timestamp=2016-06-29T00:49:43.158+0000)
>
> I did Google that.  Guess what? No such results.  Maybe instead making unfounded claims, provide some actual sources to back you up, instead of "Google it."

Yep, I'll believe him when I see a link.
Cool story. You're still acting like a Riot member doesn't understand their own code lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Odd Gnome,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:45:45.827+0000)
>
> Cool story. You're still acting like a Riot member doesn't understand their own code lol.

they don't
Mmkay. By all means if you're not enjoying the game please leave. I don't mind 15 minute queues if it means the toxic scrubs are gone.

I am not toxic during game, but how thoughtful of you to assume so. Are you a leftist safe space boy with hypoallergic extra sensitive vegan organic skin? 

I am not acting like they dont understand their own code, although their own code is very inefficient and i am 95% confident they earned their degrees from universities which also educate students in underwater basket weaving. 

I am saying they are lying. Totally different things.
Yawn. You bore me with your overused insults. You've used your basket weaving analogy on two posts now. Again I say by all means if you don't like it please leave.

Its the same topic. Now like I mentioned,, I am not toxic, so I dont have to leave, but if youre offended and the mute button isnt enough for you, you should! Work on them muscles so you can get to your other post where you can actually start a fight.

I guarantee @Riot Tantrum is just laughing his ass off reading your comments. You really need to lay of the roids homeslice. I don't feel like "fighting" is really a great way to solve problems. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I've reported several scripters who never recieved a punishment. I've also reported verbal abuse on several occassions. Only very rarely do these people receive a ban.

Obviously an automated system will have huge flaws. In this game it seems like a few unlucky ones gets banned, but the majority of the offenders are free to continue their harassment of other players.

> [{quoted}](name=Odd Gnome,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:45:45.827+0000)
>
> Cool story. You're still acting like a Riot member doesn't understand their own code lol.

Cmon, this is Riot you're talking about. It isn't exactly an unreasonable thing to believe.
I've gone through google, and I'm not finding anything. I'm getting nothing on Lexis either. Maybe you'd like to provide an actual court ruling, or specific case to look up?

> [{quoted}](name=Nik Nikerson,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000003,timestamp=2016-06-30T11:32:27.626+0000)
>
> I've gone through google, and I'm not finding anything. I'm getting nothing on Lexis either. Maybe you'd like to provide an actual court ruling, or specific case to look up?

Who comes on the Internet to lie about this stuff, man. This is like school yard stuff.
Well clearly it's the truth, which is why I ask, because I'm obviously doing something wrong and not getting the right results.

> [{quoted}](name=iisabrina,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:41:21.598+0000)
>
> He isn't "wrong,"  he is lying, and if you spend the time googling the CA high courts notes on the current litigation going on with Riot, you will find out Riot does in fact lie to their members about their tribunal system.

Source?
ooh i wanna read this

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:36:37.522+0000)
>
> What? I don't think I blacked out while writing the code and added additional random logic. Nope, just checked .. didn't black out. :-).
> 
> One report is all it takes to trigger a game review. There is no consideration for play time or purchases. Spending money in no way affects your ability to be punished.

{{summoner:11}}

Again, we understand you are paid by league of legends to lie to the public because as you know, you guys are being sued at this time and league of legends is doing everything in their power to prevent a subpoena from revealing that their code does infact incorporate RP purchase and the number of reports. 

There are bad coders in this world, doesnt take a blackout to mess up.
I'm sure they've got better stuff to do than to sit here reading your QQ's and your flawed idea that Riot's going to be shut down by a lawsuit lol.

I believe in your last post you took a final bow and said Bye, Are you going to continue harassing these posts/defending riot?

Or are you going to hit up the gym and take my advice.
I said bye to your comment to go to Overwatch. I'll be sure to start "lifting" and get some mad "gainz" before I comment on this video game thread again.
i really wanna read about this lawsuit, but I can't seem to find any news about it. do you have a link to info about this?
My sentence is written in readable English. When you learn to read English or figure out what's your actual question/learn how to write in complete sentences, come talk to me.

> [{quoted}](name=iDantes,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:31:47.243+0000)
>
> The system is automated, 1 report will not do anything.

I'm pretty sure I know how the system works.  If you don't want to believe that, I guess no one will convince you though.

Good luck.

> [{quoted}](name=TheCurator,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:32:52.855+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure I know how the system works.  If you don't want to believe that, I guess no one will convince you though.
> 
> Good luck.

Sorry, but there have been many instances when similar things have occured and the player was not punished, i.e. int feeding, verb abuse, unsportsmanlike

You've seen many instances where the player was not punished *immediately*. That doesn't mean they're never punished at all, just that the game you reported them for is not the one that directly set off the punishment.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

There is never any need to ask anyone to report anyone else. Your report is all that is needed to flag the game. 

The system looks at games reported, not at reports per game, so it gives you no benefit to ask others to report too, and incurs the risk of the person reporting you back out of spite.

*edited to add* by the way, remember that if you mute them after the first time, you won't need to hear any of the others. You can still report them after you muted them
hehe xd

I hope you also get banned for asking people to report this person since its in the list of reportable offenses. Now youre on the forum begging someone to do this. Why do you relish getting someone banned/punished? That isn't a state of healthy mental well being.

> [{quoted}](name=iisabrina,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sbQEbE6E,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:34:07.686+0000)
>
> I hope you also get banned for asking people to report this person since its in the list of reportable offenses. Now youre on the forum begging someone to do this. Why do you relish getting someone banned/punished? That isn't a state of healthy mental well being.

It's painfully obvious you're a smurf of one of the players, you're level 10 and against someone who told others to kill themselves getting banned. You aren't welcome here

I have 3 active accounts and if you doubt me I can add you on each of them. One of my FORUM accounts has a 1 day suspension for calling someone bronze and telling them to stop arguing with  me.

I would not ever tell someone to kill themselves. But why do you need to make an entire scene out of someone saying something offensive? Did you use the mute feature? No you didn't
